resources.string: Log in using your snapchat account
pingpong png displayed on login screen
bitmoji png displayed on the login screen
Enter your score here (e.g. 5 and not 5-4)...
Word not saved because it is empty.
1. Press the "Log in" button. This takes you to the Snapchat app.

2. If you have a Snapchat account, enter your username and password and press the "Log in" button (*If you do not have a Snapchat account, press the "Sign Up" button and follow the steps to create a Snapchat account*).
3. Press the "Continue" button to complete the login. This should take you to the Leaderboard page.
1. Press the \'My Profile\' icon on the top navigation bar.
2. This will take you to your profile page, in which you can view your winrate, ELO, and rank.
1. Go to your profile page by pressing the \'My Profile\' icon.
2. Your game history is displayed below your profile information.
1. Press the leaderboard icon to go to the leaderboard screen.
2. Press the profile image of the player you want to view the profile of, and this will take you to their profile page.
